price: Tunay na ito ay isang punong-kahoy na lumalabas sa ugat ng Impiyerno.
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
